name: What Would Your Life Look Like if You Were a Peasant in Medieval Europe?
name_original: What Would Your Life Look Like if You Were a Peasant in Medieval Europe?
description:
Have you ever wondered what your life would look like in a totally different time and place? Specifically, as a peasant in Medieval Europe?

Well, wonder no longer, and take this quiz!

Fullscreen recommended. If it doesn't work on mobile, click here.
